chapters.title: Chapter 16: The New Follower
chapters.info: Samwil Hark, p. 359—Very successful catpurse in Caemlyn. He has been caught by the Queen's Guards only because another ruffian ratted him out. The only way to be so successful a catpurse is to not be seen by those you stalk, so Elayne plans to use him to tail Doilin Mellar at night to see where he goes.
